tool_description: Provides evidence-based clinical decision pathways and recommendations based on patient risk profile and clinical guidelines.

clinical_scenario.description: Clinical scenario: admission_triage, treatment_selection, discharge_planning, monitoring_protocol

risk_stratum.description: Patient risk stratum: low, moderate, high, critical

care_setting.description: Current care setting: inpatient, outpatient, emergency, icu

error_messages: Invalid clinical scenario: Use admission_triage, treatment_selection, discharge_planning, or monitoring_protocol
Invalid risk stratum: Use low, moderate, high, or critical
Invalid care setting: Use inpatient, outpatient, emergency, or icu
Diagnosis not recognized: Primary diagnosis not found in clinical knowledge base
usage: Provide patient_id, clinical_scenario, risk_stratum, and primary_diagnosis. Optionally include contraindications and care_setting for personalized decision pathways.

decision_steps.description: Ordered list of decision steps to follow

alternative_options.description: Alternative clinical approaches if primary pathway unsuitable

next_decision_point.description: Next major decision point in care pathway
